archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Close Party Performance Degradation Report
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Close a party performance degradation report when the performance of the party product has been resolved.

properties.value: Close Party Performance Degradation Report closes a party performance degradation report when the performance of the party product has been resolved. These processes monitor the status of all open party performance degradation reports, and recognize that a party performance degradation report is ready to be closed when the status is changed to cleared.
